statements: SELECT material_name, material_type, upload_date FROM training_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video';
SELECT material_name, upload_date FROM training_materials WHERE material_type = 'Document' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_materials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, material_link FROM training_materials WHERE upload_date > '2021-01-01' AND upload_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT material_type, COUNT(material_id) AS total_count FROM training_materials GROUP BY material_type;
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_type, upload_date, material_link FROM training_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM training_materials WHERE material_type IN ('PDF', 'Document') ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT material_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM training_materials GROUP BY material_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_link FROM training_materials WHERE material_name LIKE '%tutorial%' ORDER BY material_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resources WHERE resource_type = 'video';
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials WHERE material_type = 'document';

SELECT resource_name, resource_url FROM resources WHERE resource_url LIKE '%.com';

SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials WHERE material_id BETWEEN 50 AND 100;

SELECT material_name, material_url FROM training_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video' ORDER BY upload_date ASC
